name: Central Sensitization Syndrome with Neuropathic Overlay
chief_complaint: I have burning pain all over my body that won't go away, and even light touch hurts
prognosis: Chronic condition requiring long-term management. Approximately 30% achieve significant functional improvement with multimodal therapy.
description: A complex pain disorder characterized by amplified CNS processing of normal sensory input combined with neuropathic features. Involves dysfunction in descending inhibitory pathways and glial cell activation. Distinct from fibromyalgia by its prominent neuropathic component.
risk_factors: prolonged opioid use prior to onset
